notes:
[Halimar Tidecaller] is a card I haven't actually gotten to play with yet, despite hearing great things about it because I keep opening it in packs like this. I'm going to take the [Akoum Firebird] since it's an efficient resilient beater that puts your opponent on a short clock.

If it wasn't here, I'd clearly take [Halimar Tidecaller] and build a sweat Awaken value deck.
